stats.name: Strength
stats.descr: Your raw physical power and resilience. Affects STR weapon damage, resistance to Wounds, HP recovery, Concentration, STR saves, carrying capacity, Grappling, and the Might skill.

stats.name: Dexterity
stats.descr: Your agility, reflexes, and precision. Affects DEX weapon damage, Initiative, DEX saves, Grappling, Armor (for some types), and the Stealth and Finesse skills.

stats.name: Intelligence
stats.descr: Your knowledge and reasoning. Affects languages, spellcasting, use of wands, spell scrolls, INT saves, and the Arcana, Examination, and Lore skills.

stats.name: Will
stats.descr: Your force of personality, courage, and wisdom. Affects spellcasting, WIL saves, and the Insight, Influence, Naturecraft, and Perception skills.

skills.name: Arcana
skills.descr: Your understanding of magical phenomena, spells, and enchantments. Use Arcana to identify magical effects, decipher arcane symbols, and discern the properties of magical items. It also grants insights into Aberrations, Elementals, and Oozes.

skills.name: Examination
skills.descr: Your aptitude for thorough analysis and deduction. Use Examination to diagnose injuries, determine causes of death, uncover clues, and unravel the workings of traps or mechanical devices. It also grants insights into Constructs.

skills.name: Finesse
skills.descr: Your ability to use your hands and feet in careful ways. Use Finesse for picking locks, disarming traps, piloting vehicles, tinkering, card tricks, stealing or planting items, climbing, or any task requiring precise, careful movement.

skills.name: Influence
skills.descr: Your persuasiveness, charm, and ability to influence others. Use Influence to convince or deceive people, negotiate deals, build trust, win allies, or put on captivating performances.

skills.name: Insight
skills.descr: Your ability to understand people and situations beyond the obvious. Use Insight to sense motives, detect lies, read hidden emotions, make sense of clues, and think ahead when faced with uncertainty.

skills.name: Might
skills.descr: Your ability to apply strength effectively. Use Might for lifting heavy objects, breaking through obstacles, climbing, swimming, jumping, or performing feats of strength.

skills.name: Lore
skills.descr: Your understanding of history, kingdoms, and religions. Use Lore to recall historical events and grasp the significance of cultural practices. It extends to knowledge of Celestials, Dragons, Fey, Fiends, Giants, Humanoids, and Undead.

skills.name: Naturecraft
skills.descr: Your expertise in wilderness survival, navigation, tracking, and handling animals. Use Naturecraft to thrive in the wild, understand beasts, and navigate natural environments. It also grants insights into Beasts, Monstrosities, and Plants.

skills.name: Perception
skills.descr: Your awareness of your surroundings. Use Perception to notice hidden enemies, spot traps, hear distant sounds, or detect anything out of the ordinary in your environment.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.descr: Your ability to move silently and remain unseen. Use Stealth to sneak past guards, hide from enemies, or move without being detected.

conditions.name: Blinded
conditions.descr: You cannot see. Attacks against you have advantage, and your attacks have disadvantage.

conditions.name: Bloodied
conditions.descr: You are at half HP or less.

conditions.name: Dazed
conditions.descr: You have disadvantage on attacks and cannot take reactions.

conditions.name: Distracted
conditions.descr: A target is Distracted if it is adjacent to or Taunted by an ally, or if it cannot see you.

conditions.name: Dying
conditions.descr: You are at 0 HP and making death saves.

conditions.name: Frightened
conditions.descr: You cannot willingly move closer to the source of your fear.

conditions.name: Grappled
conditions.descr: Your speed is 0 and you cannot move.

conditions.name: Invisible
conditions.descr: You cannot be seen. Attacks against you have disadvantage, and your attacks have advantage.

conditions.name: Paralyzed
conditions.descr: You cannot move or take actions. Attacks against you have advantage.

conditions.name: Prone
conditions.descr: You are lying on the ground. Melee attacks against you have advantage, ranged attacks have disadvantage. You can stand up by spending half your movement.

conditions.name: Restrained
conditions.descr: Your movement is heavily restricted. Attacks against you have advantage, and your attacks have disadvantage.

conditions.name: Stunned
conditions.descr: You cannot move, take actions, or reactions.

conditions.name: Taunted
conditions.descr: You have disadvantage on attacks against targets other than the creature that taunted you.

conditions.name: Unconscious
conditions.descr: You are knocked out and unaware of your surroundings. Attacks against you have advantage.

mechanics.criticalHit: Roll maximum damage on primary die
mechanics.advantage: Roll additional die and keep highest
mechanics.disadvantage: Roll additional die and keep lowest
